TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kaminu, title = Kaminu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kaminu} }

S.FORM: Kaminu Itiniay i Yanping Cen no Taitung ko Kaminu a niyaro', 27 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 75 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 87% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 65 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 13% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 67%, Amis 12%, Tayal 1%, roma 7%.

Kamino Itiniay i Yanping Cen no Taitong ko Kamino a niyaro', 27 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 75 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 87% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 65 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 13% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 67%, Amis 12%, Tayal 1%, roma 7%.
